# isValid

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the receiver is valid.

## Declaration

```swift
var isValid: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] if the receiver is known to be invalid, otherwise [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true].

An `NSPort` object becomes invalid when its underlying communication resource, which is operating system dependent, is closed or damaged.

## Validation

- **invalidate()**: Marks the receiver as invalid and posts an [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Port/didBecomeInvalidNotification] to the default notification center.
